description: Episode of Series "Acquaintance Rape". Demonstrates the occurrence of sexual assaults between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage boy whose desire to be accepted as one of the boys call for participation in a gang rape. Points out various factors which contribute to the assault situation, and emphasises the need for young people to undertstand their own sexual values and those of others.
